namespace.name: CaloDigitStatus
namespace.desc: @brief Predefined constants for the digit status flags
namespace.author: Vanya Belyaev Ivan.Belyaev@itep.ru

enum.name: Mask
enum.value: Undefined = 0,SeedCell = 1,LocalMaximum = 2,CentralCell = 4 , OwnedCell = 8, EdgeCell = 16 , SharedCell =32 , UseForEnergy = 64 , UseForPosition = 128, UseForCovariance = 256, ModifiedBy3x3Tagger = 512, ModifiedByMax2x2Tagger = 1024, ModifiedByNeighbourTagger = 2048, ModifiedBySwissCrossTagger = 4096, ModifiedByAllTagger = 8192
